calculatePasswordStrength=password=>{let strength=0;if(password.length>=6)strength++;if(password.length>=10)strength++;if(/[a-z]/.test(password)&&/[A-Z]/.test(password))strength++;if(/\d/.test(password))strength++;if(/[^a-zA-Z0-9]/.test(password))strength++;setPasswordStrength(strength);};const emailRegex=/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;if(!formData.email.trim()){errors.email='Email is required';}else if(!emailRegex.test(formData.email)){errors.email='Please enter a valid email address';}if(!formData.username.trim()){errors.username='Username is required';}else if(formData.username.trim().length<3){errors.username='Username must be at least 3 characters';}else if(formData.password.length<6){errors.password='Password must be at least 6 characters';}if(!formData.confirmPassword){errors.confirmPassword='Please confirm your password';}else
